00030 void init_comm_options() {
00031   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00032     ("workers", i32(), "Number of worker threads")
00033     ("reactors", i32(), "Number of reactor threads")
00034     ("timeout,t", i32()->default_value(20000),
00035         "System wide timeout in milliseconds")
00036     ;
00037   alias("timeout", "Hypertable.Request.Timeout");
00038 }
00039 
00040 void init_comm() {
00041   int32_t num_cores = System::get_processor_count();
00042 
00043   if (get_bool("verbose"))
00044     std::cout <<"CPU cores count="<< num_cores << std::endl;
00045 
00046   int32_t reactors = get("reactors", num_cores);
00047 
00048   if (!has("reactors"))
00049     properties->add("reactors", reactors);
00050 
00051   ReactorFactory::initialize(reactors);
00052 }
00053 
00054 void init_generic_server_options() {
00055   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00056     ("port", i16(), "Listening port")
00057     ("pidfile", str(), "File to contain the process id")
00058     ;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void init_generic_server() {
00062   String pidfile = get("pidfile", String());
00063 
00064   if (pidfile.length()) {
00065     std::ofstream out(pidfile.c_str());
00066 
00067     if (out)
00068       out << System::get_pid() << std::endl;
00069     else
00070       HT_FATAL_OUT <<"Could not create pid file: "<< pidfile << HT_END;
00071   }
00072 }
